component.name: Rich Textarea
component.description: A rich textarea component that combines basic textarea functionality with enhanced features like auto-growing height, character counters, and comprehensive formatting hints. Supports markdown preview, syntax highlighting, and fully customizable placeholder text.

variants.name: Default
variants.description: A feature-rich textarea implementation with auto-expanding behavior, helpful character counting, clear visual feedback, and responsive design. Provides enhanced text input experience with thoughtful features and intuitive controls that improve overall user productivity.
